Sql.query: insert into dpo_trafobarra( tnfbarcodi, tnfbartnfcodi, tnfbarbarcodi, tnfbarbarnombre, tnfbarbartension ) values( :tnfbarcodi, :tnfbartnfcodi, :tnfbarbarcodi, :tnfbarbarnombre, :tnfbarbartension )
select tnfbarcodi, tnfbartnfcodi, tnfbarbarcodi, tnfbarbarnombre, tnfbarbartension from dpo_trafobarra where tnfbarcodi = :tnfbarcodi
select tnfbarcodi, tnfbartnfcodi, tnfbarbarcodi, tnfbarbarnombre, tnfbarbartension from dpo_trafobarra
select tnfbarcodi, tnfbartnfcodi, tnfbarbarcodi, tnfbarbarnombre, tnfbarbartension from dpo_trafobarra where tnfbarcodi in ({0})
